name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and olive oil. The dough is hand-stretched and baked in a wood-fired oven for a crispy crust.

name: Sushi Platter
description: An assortment of sushi rolls including salmon, tuna, and avocado rolls, served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: A fragrant rice dish cooked with marinated chicken, basmati rice, saffron, and aromatic spices such as cardamom, cloves, and cinnamon.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Traditional Mexican tacos made with marinated pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro, served on corn tortillas with salsa.

name: French Croissant
description: A buttery, flaky pastry made with layers of dough and butter, rolled and folded multiple times before being baked to perfection.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, served on a toasted bun.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Creamy pasta made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Ramen
description: A rich broth with wheat noodles, topped with sliced pork, egg, green onions, and nori.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.
